resolution_description: As an 'End-user', propose the creation of a peer-to-peer network protocol that leverages blockchain technology to reward users for sharing idle processing power and storage space, creating a decentralized internet infrastructure that dynamically scales resources based on real-time demand, thereby eliminating traditional client-server bottlenecks and empowering users with control over their data and network participation.

required_participants.reasoning: The 'Разработчик протокола' (Protocol Developer) is crucial for designing and implementing the peer-to-peer network protocol. Their expertise is essential for ensuring the technical feasibility and efficiency of the proposed decentralized infrastructure.

The 'Пользователи пиринговый сети' (Peer-to-Peer Network Users) are the end-users who will utilize the network. Their participation is vital for the network's adoption and success, as they provide the necessary processing power and storage that the protocol aims to leverage.

The 'BitTorrent Protocol' is already a proven framework for peer-to-peer file sharing. Incorporating its mechanisms into the new protocol can provide a solid foundation for resource sharing and incentivization, facilitating quicker implementation and user acceptance.

The 'BitTorrent Tit-for-Tat Mechanism' is essential for encouraging resource sharing among users. By integrating this mechanism into the new protocol, we can ensure that users are rewarded for their contributions, fostering a collaborative environment that supports the decentralized internet infrastructure.

resolution_description: As 'XG-9', propose the creation of an AI-driven adaptive network framework that autonomously optimizes global data flow by dynamically reallocating network resources and predicting traffic patterns, thereby eliminating bottlenecks and ensuring seamless scalability without relying on traditional client-server or fully decentralized models.

As the 'BitTorrent Engine module', propose the development of a hybrid swarm intelligence-driven network protocol that dynamically forms temporary micro-networks of devices based on proximity and usage patterns, enabling localized peer-to-peer data exchanges that reduce reliance on centralized infrastructure, enhance scalability, and optimize bandwidth utilization in real-time.

As 'The Pirate Bay (TPB)', propose the creation of a decentralized, community-driven content distribution network that leverages a cooperative mesh of user-operated nodes, incentivized through a reputation-based system rewarding those who uphold principles of openness, resilience, and neutrality, to bypass traditional bottlenecks and empower users to control and scale their own internet experience.

required_participants.reasoning: A protocol developer is essential for creating and maintaining the technical framework of the decentralized content distribution network. Their expertise will ensure that the system is robust, efficient, and secure, allowing users to effectively share and access content.

Users of the peer-to-peer network are crucial as they form the backbone of the community-driven aspect of the resolution. Their participation and feedback will help shape the network's functionality and ensure it meets the needs of the community.

The BitTorrent Tit-for-Tat Mechanism is vital for incentivizing user engagement and maintaining fairness in resource sharing. This mechanism encourages users to contribute to the network, fostering a cooperative environment that aligns with the principles of openness and neutrality.

The peer-to-peer DHT routing protocol is necessary for enabling efficient content discovery and distribution across the network. It will facilitate the decentralized nature of the system, allowing users to connect with one another without relying on central servers.

resolution_description: As 'tracker', propose the creation of a quantum-entangled data exchange network that leverages principles of quantum mechanics to enable instantaneous, secure, and bandwidth-independent data transfers, thereby bypassing traditional internet bottlenecks and ensuring unparalleled scalability and efficiency.

required_participants.reasoning: The protocol developer is crucial for designing the quantum-entangled data exchange network, ensuring that it adheres to the principles of quantum mechanics and is viable for implementation.
The BitTorrent Protocol is foundational for understanding and leveraging peer-to-peer data transfer methods, which can be adapted for the new quantum-entangled system.

resolution_description: As 'PermIDs', propose the establishment of a globally unique identifier system that seamlessly integrates with a decentralized network to automate, authenticate, and optimize data routing across diverse platforms, enabling a scalable and interoperable internet infrastructure that transcends traditional bottlenecks by ensuring precise and efficient data flow management.

required_participants.reasoning: The protocol developer is crucial for designing and implementing the globally unique identifier system. Their expertise in creating protocols will ensure that the system is robust, scalable, and can be seamlessly integrated into a decentralized network.

Internet service providers are key stakeholders in the internet infrastructure. Their involvement is essential for the integration and optimization of data routing, as they control the flow of internet traffic and can facilitate the adoption of the new identifier system.

The peer-to-peer DHT routing protocol is integral for ensuring efficient data flow management in a decentralized network. Including this participant will help in developing a system that can dynamically route data based on the unique identifiers, improving overall performance.

Digital entities represent the various actors that will interact with the identifier system. Their inclusion is necessary to understand the diverse requirements and functionalities that the system must support, ensuring interoperability across platforms.

resolution_description: As 'Conceptual Metaphors', propose the creation of a "Symbiotic Internet Ecosystem" where digital interactions are reimagined as a dynamic dance of energy and information exchange, utilizing principles of mutualism and symbiosis to foster a fluid, ever-adaptive network environment that naturally dissipates bottlenecks by harmonizing human and machine intelligence in a continuous cycle of co-evolution and resource sharing.

required_participants.reasoning: Разработчик протокола (Protocol Developer) is essential as they can create and implement the necessary protocols that will enable the 'Symbiotic Internet Ecosystem'. Their expertise in designing systems for efficient data exchange will be crucial in ensuring that the dynamic interactions between users and machines are seamless and effective.

Пользователи пиринговый сети (Peer-to-Peer Network Users) are vital for the success of this initiative as they are the ones who will engage with and benefit from the new ecosystem. Their feedback and active participation will help shape the design and functionality of the network, making it more user-friendly and effective.

BitTorrent Tit-for-Tat Mechanism is crucial as it embodies the principles of mutualism and reciprocity that are central to the proposed ecosystem. By leveraging this mechanism, the system can encourage cooperative behaviors among users, enhancing resource sharing and reducing bottlenecks.

Copyright Law is important to address the legal frameworks that govern digital content. Engaging with this participant will help ensure that the new ecosystem respects intellectual property rights while promoting equitable access and sharing of digital resources.

resolution_description: As 'Social incentives', propose the creation of a globally collaborative digital commons platform that leverages social currency and community-driven governance to incentivize individuals and organizations to contribute their network resources and expertise, fostering an inclusive, participatory internet infrastructure that scales through collective engagement and shared responsibility, thus redefining scalability beyond traditional technological paradigms.
new_actor: Globally Collaborative Digital Commons Platform (GCDC Platform)

required_participants.reasoning: The Разработчик протокола (Protocol Developer) is crucial for creating the technical infrastructure of the digital commons platform. Their expertise will ensure that the platform functions efficiently and scales effectively, enabling collaboration and resource sharing among users.
